it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

Class AddressDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.AddressDatabase

  • public class AddressDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Class AddressDatabase allows the management of allocated IP addresses

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressDatabase()
      Costructs the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Returns true if the database contains the IP address
      boolean containsCid(java.lang.String cid)
      Returns true if the database contains the client ID (e.g. the PH address)
      java.lang.String getAddress(java.lang.String cid)
      Returns the IP address associated to a client ID (e.g. the PH address)
      java.lang.String getExpiredAddress()
      Returns the first expired IP address still in the database
      boolean put(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String cid, long exptime)
      Adds a new IP address, associated with its unique ID (e.g. the PH address) and expiration time.
      void remove(java.lang.String address)
      Removes an IP address form the database
      void renew(java.lang.String addr, long exptime)
      Renews a lease
      int size()
      Gets the number of allcated addreses

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressDatabase

        public AddressDatabase()
        Costructs the database

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public boolean put(java.lang.String address,
                   java.lang.String cid,
                   long exptime)
        Adds a new IP address, associated with its unique ID (e.g. the PH address) and expiration time. It returns false if the IP address or the PH address is already present.

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String address)
        Removes an IP address form the database

      • containsAddress

        public boolean containsAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Returns true if the database contains the IP address

      • containsCid

        public boolean containsCid(java.lang.String cid)
        Returns true if the database contains the client ID (e.g. the PH address)

      • getAddress

        public java.lang.String getAddress(java.lang.String cid)
        Returns the IP address associated to a client ID (e.g. the PH address)

      • renew

        public void renew(java.lang.String addr,
                  long exptime)
        Renews a lease

      • getExpiredAddress

        public java.lang.String getExpiredAddress()
        Returns the first expired IP address still in the database

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the number of allcated addreses
